messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the consequence of Rodger failing his Fighting (Brawl) skill?
Either 11 or 81 (penalty die) is rolled.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the cultist's action after failing to break free?
The cultist raises his feet to waist height and pushes against the nearby pillar.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of Rodger's action to resist the cultist's push?
To use Rodger’s Dodge skill.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the penalty the cultist has for being restrained?
One penalty die.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What skill does Rodger use to avoid the attack?
Rodger’s Dodge skill
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many points of damage does Rodger take from the attack?
10 points of damage
You are a helpful AI assistant.
As a result of the attack, what is Rodger automatically knocked?
prone
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the result of Rodger passing a CON roll?
Rodger remains conscious
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the result of Rodger's hit points being reduced to 4?
Rodger is automatically knocked prone and must release his hold on the cultist.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does Harvey decide to do with the cultist?
He flees the scene.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of attack does Rodger use on the cultist?
thrown weapon attack
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why does the Keeper allow the cultist to not dodge the attack?
because he is unaware of the attack
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What spell does the cultist attempt to use on Harvey?
Dominate spell
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the cultist's Dominate spell?
it fails
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the outcome of the cultist's Dominate spell?
The spell fails.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does Harvey do when the cultist approaches?
Harvey pretends to be under the cultist's command.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Is the train pulling in at the moment Harvey's player asks?
Yes, according to the Keeper, the train is pulling in.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does Harvey's Luck roll determine?
The situation, specifically whether the train is pulling in.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who takes the case from Harvey?
A cultist, who reaches to take the case from him.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What action does Harvey take to use the situation?
He pushes the cultist in front of the train, using the briefcase.
